value: — the center of the region. The city preserves several churches from the 18th century and a magnificent ensemble of Soviet-time buildings.

— the second largest city of the region with a fine complex of secular buildings from the late 19th-early 20th century and remains of a 19th-century fortress. In Russia, the city is well-known as an object of the contemporary slang.

— this charming town is home to two catholic churches from the 17th-18th century and earthen fortifications of an ancient fortress.
